column5: I love it! My anxiety tattoo is a little bundle of lavender. Lavender is supposed to have calming effects so it’s just kind of reminder to myself to take a breath and try and calm down and ground myself. I love this idea though.
I just did the same today. I’m proud of myself and you. It’s a hard step but I’m so excited.
I finally reached out and contacted a therapist. I’m so proud of myself and happy to start putting my health first.
